hero.title: Ithute go Buisa
hero.subtitle: Setlhao sa go buisa le go kwala sa mahala sa Aforika Borwa le kwa ntle

stats.title: Goreng go Buisa go le Botlhokwa
stats.description: ya baithuti ba Mophato wa 4 mo Aforika Borwa ga ba kgone go buisa ka go tlhaloganya
stats.languagesDesc: Dipuo tsa semmuso mo Aforika Borwa tse tlhokang tshegetso ya go buisa

features.title: Re go Thusa Jang go Ithuta

voice.title: Go Buisa ka Lentswe
voice.description: Reetsa mafoko a buisiwa kwa godimo fa o ntse o latela

highlight.title: Go Galaletsa Lefoko
highlight.description: Lefoko lengwe le lengwe le a galalediwa fa o buisa, le bontsha tsela

speed.title: Lebelo le le ka Fetolwang
speed.description: Laola gore go buisa go tsamaya ka bonako jo bokae kgotsa ka bonya jo bokae

languages.title: Dipuo di le Dintsi
languages.description: Ithute ka Setswana, Sesotho, Sezulu, le tse dingwe

regions.title: Dikgang le Dikgang tse tswang Aforika

learn.title: Ithute go Buisa
learn.subtitle: Ikatise go buisa ka dithuto tse eteleditsweng ke lentswe
learn.customText: Tsenya mokwalo wa gago go ikatisa

lessons.title: Dithuto tsa go Buisa
lessons.subtitle: Dithuto tse latellanang go tswa ditlhaka go ya dikgang

news.title: Dikgang tsa Aforika
news.subtitle: Buisa dikgang tsa Aforika Borwa le mo kontinenteng yotlhe
news.externalSources: Metswedi ya Dikgang ya Kwa Ntle

about.title: Ka ga go Ithuta go Buisa SA

mission.title: Maikaelelo a Rona
mission.text: Re dumela gore mongwe le mongwe o tshwanetse go nna le t≈°hono ya go ithuta go buisa. Setlhao sa rona se fana ka thuto ya mahala, e e fitlhelelang ya go buisa le go kwala ka dipuo tsa Aforika Borwa le kwa ntle.

crisis.title: Mathata a go Buisa le go Kwala
crisis.text: Aforika Borwa e lebane le nngwe ya dipalopalo tse di maswe go gaisa tsa go buisa le go kwala magareng a dinaga tse di tshwanang. Dipatlisiso di bontsha gore 78% ya baithuti ba Mophato wa 4 ga ba kgone go buisa ka go tlhaloganya.

causes.title: Goreng Se se Direga
causes.poverty: Lehuma le thibela phitlhelelo ya dibuka le didiriswa tsa go ithuta
causes.resources: Dikolo di tlhoka dibuka le barutabana ba ba katisitsweng
causes.language: Bana gantsi ba ithuta ka puo ya bobedi
causes.early: Phitlhelelo e e kwa tlase ya go buisa mo bongwaneng

solution.title: Re Thusa Jang
solution.text: Setlhao sa rona se dirisa mekgwa e e needitsweng go thusa batho go ithuta go buisa mo dingwageng dife le dife.

footer.mission: Go thusa Maaforika Borwa le Maaforika otlhe go ithuta go buisa, lefoko ka lefoko.
footer.contactText: A o na le dipotso kgotsa o batla go thusa? Ikgolaganye le rona.

common.error: Go na le se se sitileng
